name: MaterialButton
desc: A utility class for building Material buttons that depend on the ambient [ButtonTheme] and [Theme].

fields.name: onPressed
fields.desc: The callback that is called when the button is tapped or otherwise activated.

fields.name: onLongPress
fields.desc: The callback that is called when the button is long-pressed.

fields.name: onHighlightChanged
fields.desc: Called by the underlying [InkWell] widget's [InkWell.onHighlightChanged] callback.

fields.name: mouseCursor
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.material.RawMaterialButton.mouseCursor}

fields.name: textTheme
fields.desc: Defines the button's base colors, and the defaults for the button's minimum size, internal padding, and shape.

fields.name: textColor
fields.desc: The color to use for this button's text.

fields.name: disabledTextColor
fields.desc: The color to use for this button's text when the button is disabled.

fields.name: color
fields.desc: The button's fill color, displayed by its [Material], while it is in its default (unpressed, [enabled]) state.

fields.name: disabledColor
fields.desc: The fill color of the button when the button is disabled.

fields.name: splashColor
fields.desc: The splash color of the button's [InkWell].

fields.name: focusColor
fields.desc: The fill color of the button's [Material] when it has the input focus.

fields.name: hoverColor
fields.desc: The fill color of the button's [Material] when a pointer is hovering over it.

fields.name: highlightColor
fields.desc: The highlight color of the button's [InkWell].

fields.name: elevation
fields.desc: The z-coordinate at which to place this button relative to its parent.

fields.name: hoverElevation
fields.desc: The elevation for the button's [Material] when the button is [enabled] and a pointer is hovering over it.

fields.name: focusElevation
fields.desc: The elevation for the button's [Material] when the button is [enabled] and has the input focus.

fields.name: highlightElevation
fields.desc: The elevation for the button's [Material] relative to its parent when the button is [enabled] and pressed.

fields.name: disabledElevation
fields.desc: The elevation for the button's [Material] relative to its parent when the button is not [enabled].

fields.name: colorBrightness
fields.desc: The theme brightness to use for this button.

fields.name: child
fields.desc: The button's label.

fields.name: padding
fields.desc: The internal padding for the button's [child].

fields.name: visualDensity
fields.desc: Defines how compact the button's layout will be.

fields.name: shape
fields.desc: The shape of the button's [Material].

fields.name: clipBehavior
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.material.Material.clipBehavior}

fields.name: focusNode
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.widgets.Focus.focusNode}

fields.name: autofocus
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.widgets.Focus.autofocus}

fields.name: animationDuration
fields.desc: Defines the duration of animated changes for [shape] and [elevation].

fields.name: materialTapTargetSize
fields.desc: Configures the minimum size of the tap target.

fields.name: minWidth
fields.desc: The smallest horizontal extent that the button will occupy.

fields.name: height
fields.desc: The vertical extent of the button.

fields.name: enableFeedback
fields.desc: Whether detected gestures should provide acoustic and/or haptic feedback.
